#summary Method lookupType details

= /lookupType/(query) =

List of any matching item types.

== Attributes ==

|| icon || String ||
|| itemCategoryID || Number ||
|| itemTypeID || Number ||
|| name || String ||

== Limitations ==

  * Maximum 50 results (EveDb constraint)
  * Minimum 3 letters (EveDb constraint)
  * Only matches that begin with query string (AppEngine constraint)
  * ~~Case-sensitive (AppEngine constraint)~~ Case-insensitive from 1.7

== Examples ==

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/lookupType/blah-blah lookupType/blah-blah] (JSON)
{{{
[]
}}}

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/lookupType/blah-blah lookupType/blah-blah] (XML)
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<rowset/>
}}}
